fields.headline: College Days
fields.bodyText: Name Ewan McGregor. Born March 31, 1971. Occupation One of Britain's biggest filmstars. His career zoomed off in 1994 with Shallow Grave. Swung a mean light sabre in Star Wars, the Prequel. College Kirkcaldy College of Technology (now Fife College). Course National Certificate in Theatre Arts. Attended 1989-1990. A tutor recalls: "I always say he didn't particularly stand out and then I get castigated for it. He was a good enough student, but there are others I remember much more clearly than Ewan. He was good at accents and I remember he carried off a particularly good American accent for his final speech."
